page.title: 15Pets
page.content: I found out about the pets that people kept in the homes in the south east part of Ogbourne St George village. Most homes had a pet. We looked at 23 houses.The most popular was a cat, there are 18 cats. There are 11 dogs, 2 rabbits, 1 pony,3 fish.One household has 4 dogs and cat. The old people have the birds, I expect the birds are easy to keep they don't need exercising and they are cheaper to feed. Old people like the birds for company if they are on their own. Younger people have dogs because they have the energy to exercise them.Dogs cost more to keep and belong to households that are earning wages.
